channel.title: Smudge Sig TUT
channel.description:
Im going to make a smudge sig (My siggy) :| so lets get started:
First pick out a canvas [IMG]http://img241.imageshack.us/img241/918/tut1ey0.png[/img]
Then get a render , I used a demon/dragon looking thing with a black background.. [IMG]http://img301.imageshack.us/img301/3150/tut2xb2.png[/img]
Then get out your defualt brushes and use these settings *I still have to get the settings* [IMG]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/949/tut3gs7.png[/img]
Duplicate the render layer 4 times (CRTL + J) and hide 3 of them, then smudge around the first layer and set that to screen [IMG]http://img245.imageshack.us/img245/3161/tut4bx8.png[/img]
Then unhide the 2nd one and smudge with a maple leaf brush, set that layer to Linear Dodge [IMG]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/9721/tut5gp1.png[/img]
Now make a Plus brush (50x50 canvas arial font) and go to Edit> define brush preset... [IMG]http://img241.imageshack.us/img241/861/tut6ny7.png[/img]
Unhide the 3rd render layer and get out your + Brush and smudge it but not as much and set it to Color Dodge [IMG]http://img139.imageshack.us/img139/3254/tut7us5.png[/img]
Get a C4D . Ripple it with amount 175 and size large, set it to color dodge [IMG]http://img235.imageshack.us/img235/7594/tut8py7.png[/img]
Get another C4D do the same thing and set it to color dodge [IMG]http://img167.imageshack.us/img167/7891/tut9ue8.png[/img]
Get another C4D do the same thing again..and set it to color dodge [IMG]http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/7274/tut10uy5.png[/img]
Now do a gradient map by going to Image>Adjustments>Grandient Map and do this gradient [IMG]http://img133.imageshack.us/img133/5673/tut12fl5.png[/img]
Set the gradient to multiply , Add text and any more effects you want and wala your finished :] [IMG]http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/4946/tut11xx6.png[/img]
~Thanks for reading this tutorial -Fast Ballz

item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Yea I should have lowered the opacity of the gradient map a bit lower…And thanks

item.title: Smudge Sig TUT
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Im going to make a smudge sig (My siggy) so lets get started:

First pick out a canvas

Then get a render , I used a demon/dragon looking thing with a black background…

Then get out your defualt brushes and use these settings I still have to get the settings

Duplicate the render layer 4 times (CRTL + J) and hide 3 of them, then smudge around the first layer and set that to screen

Then unhide the 2nd one and smudge with a maple leaf brush, set that layer to Linear Dodge

Now make a Plus brush (50x50 canvas arial font) and go to Edit> define brush preset…

Unhide the 3rd render layer and get out your + Brush and smudge it but not as much and set it to Color Dodge

Get a C4D . Ripple it with amount 175 and size large, set it to color dodge

Get another C4D do the same thing and set it to color dodge

Get another C4D do the same thing again…and set it to color dodge

Now do a gradient map by going to Image>Adjustments>Grandient Map and do this gradient

Set the gradient to multiply , Add text and any more effects you want and wala your finished :]

~Thanks for reading this tutorial
-Fast Ballz
